pullrequest.title: Use matrix job to build all brew bottle flavours in one job

content.raw:
this job built bottles, but the downstream jobs couldn't find the artifacts:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder/9/
* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/repository_uploader_ng/5950/console
* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_pr_bottle_hash_updater/574/console
content.html:
this job built bottles, but the downstream jobs couldn't find the artifacts:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder/9/
  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/repository_uploader_ng/5950/console
  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_pr_bottle_hash_updater/574/console
